name: Project Heirloom - Liquidation Order

sections.title: TO
sections.text:
Oakhaven Facility Director
Security Division Chief
Medical Division Chief

sections.title: DIRECTIVE
sections.text:
Effective immediately, Project Heirloom is to be
terminated with extreme prejudice.

The Oakhaven facility has been sold to Omni-Global
Development. Transfer of property requires complete
vacation of all Bio-Dyne assets, including biological
materials.

You are authorized to use Protocol CLEAN SWEEP.

No subjects are to survive.
No records are to remain.
No witnesses.

sections.title: METHOD
sections.text:
1. Obtain maintenance access codes from local asset
2. Seal all exits
3. Reverse ventilation system
4. Deploy Agent-7 (Nerve Agent) via HVAC
5. Wait 4 hours for dispersal
6. Sweep team confirms zero survivors
7. Incinerate biological materials
8. Format all local storage

sections.title: COVER STORY
sections.text:
Official cause: Industrial gas leak.
Media contacts have been briefed.
Local authorities have been compensated.

sections.title: TIMELINE
sections.text:
Execution: 2142-08-22, 0200 hours
Property transfer: 2142-08-25

Failure is not an option.

gmNotes: This is the smoking gun proving Bio-Dyne's guilt. It shows the massacre was planned, deliberate, and covered up. The 'local asset' mentioned is Jax - they used him to get the vent codes. The deletion failed note suggests the system crashed before it could destroy evidence.
